title: Boutique Electronique en Ligne
description: A complete technical solution for selling electronic products. Developed an e-commerce store with advanced stock management, detailed technical product sheets, secure payment integration, and customer support tailored to the technical needs of the electronics sector.

title: Dentiste Registre
description: A dental clinic management system built from a Bootstrap template. Manages patients, appointments, consultations, documents, and features a role-based authentication system.

title: Systeme de Gestion Electronique de Documents (GED)
description: A web application for document management featuring hierarchical folder structures, file upload/download, role and folder-based access control, search functionality, and an explorer-style interface.
